title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none', it does not take effect in the new PDF emitter.
EB: When previewing the PDF, the label should disappear.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Observe that the label is still visible, instead of disappearing as expected.
